titleStmt.title: A brief vindication of VVilliam Jervis, gent. Against the scandalous aspersions of John Hodder, gent. By way of a narrative.
titleStmt.author: Jervis, William, Gent.

notesStmt.note: Thomason copy imperfect; print show-through on first and last pages.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
